Title: Requires providers of residential services to developmentally disabled children to have surveillance cameras in the common areas of their residential facilities
Summary: Requires providers of residential services to developmentally disabled children to have surveillance cameras in the common areas of their residential facilities.
LawCode: Add ยง16.39, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to duties of providers of services for the developmentally disabled
